title: Write the Equation in Standard Form
speech: It is in standard form  fraction, x squared, over 4,  plus, fraction, y squared, over 25,  is equal to 1 .

title: Determine Whether the Major Axis is Horizontal or Vertical
text: Since $$4<25$$ and $$25$$ is in the $$y^2$$ term, the major axis is vertical.
speech: Since  4 is less than, 25  and  25  is in the  y squared  term, the major axis is vertical.
pacedSpeech: term, the major axis is vertical.

title: Find the endpoints of the major axis.
text: The endpoints will be the y-intercept. Since $$b^2=25$$ then $$b=-5$$ or $$b=5$$. The endpoint of the major axis are $$(0,5)$$, $$(0,-5)$$.

title: Elimination of Choices
text: SInce graph $$1$$ is the only graph with y-intercepts as $$(0,5)$$ and $$(0,-5)$$, graph $$1$$ is the final answer.
